item.title: Trump Is Right About Birthright Citizenship
item.description: Trump isn’t rewriting the 14th Amendment; he’s applying the law as it is, based on its plain language and the Supreme Court’s existing precedent.

item.title: What ‘Wicked’ And The Not-So-Wonderful Wizard Teach About The Power Of Propaganda
item.description: Although much of the buzz around 'Wicked' has focused on 'queering,' it is the concepts of propaganda and tyranny that drive the film.

item.title: The Only Way To Make Abortion Unthinkable Is To Wipe Out The Feminism Fueling It
item.description: Feminism is the ideology that pro-lifers need to focus our energy against. Until we do, feminism will just keep on fueling abortion’s engine, one prec...

item.title: Indiana Republicans Should Defund Group That Sued For ‘Nonbinary’ Driver’s Licenses
item.description: Gov. Braun should defund the left-wing Indiana Legal Services, which seeks to undermine Indiana values with 'nonbinary' driver's licenses.

item.title: Trump Brings Life Back To The White House
item.description: In his first week in office, President Trump has signaled his commitment to remaining the 'most pro-life president.'
